title: LFT OCE Open Ladder (Silver II) - Mid
body:
IGN: Sacrifice x
Age: 17 
Rank: Silver II
Main Role: Mid
Availability: After work - will be on around (4:00pm-5:00pm)
Communication: Curse/Teamspeak/Skype

Looking to join a serious team that will stick together and hoping to go far in future. I've had previous experience on playing P2P (Pay 2 Play) leagues on Cyber Gaming (CGa). I am comfortable playing against plats/diamonds as I've played many scrims and customs games with mates. I am willing to trial after work if necessary or weekends as I am free most of the day. Add (Sacrifice x).

Thanks. :D
